pages.text: From the leaves of the Garsale Tree, you have a small chance to get a Garsale Fruit, which can lower the Garhenna depletion rate due to its healing properties. It can be crafted into a highly nutritious Garsale Cake or Garsale Elixir, which can further reduce depletion and grant temporary protection. For convenience, garsale fruits can be stored in large boxes.
